Title: Long Live the Bride and Groom
Writer: Rafael Azcona (story), Luis García Berlanga (story), Rafael Azcona (screenplay), Luis García Berlanga (screenplay), Rafael Azcona (dialogue)
Actors: José Luis López Vázquez, Laly Soldevila, José María Prada, Manuel Alexandre
Plot: Leo travels with his mother to a touristic Mediterranean spot in order to marry his girlfriend Loli. However, the funny and open minded girls from Northern Europe make Leo reconsider his plans.
